name: Happidition
description:
Happidition is a holistic wellness B2B & B2C company specializing in 6 wellness dimensions, namely, Emotional, Mental, Occupational, Intellectual, Digital, and Spiritual.
 We aim to help people attain happy and healthy well-being through holistic evidence-based approaches. Our goal is to help you build a way of life through which you can understand yourself better to attain & maintain your health and happiness. Our founder is Ms. Sneha Vashisht who is the Founder & CEO of Happidition, an Internationally Certified Psychotherapist (L. No: 10662322), Behavioral Psychologist, and Corporate Wellness Trainer who has trained over 1.2 lakh plus people across top corporates, schools and colleges across India, US, & Europe. She is also a Business Coach, an Advanced Reiki Healer & has been Awarded the Leadership Excellence Award as Emerging Face of Global Leadership, and has been a part of the Global 30 Under 30 Leadership Summit. She is among the top trainers in India specializing in holistic wellness, leadership, and training.
Headline: Assess | Elevate | Transform
ShortDescription: Happidition is a holistic wellness B2B & B2C company specializing in 6 wellness dimensions, namely, Emotional, Mental, Occupational, Intellectual, Digital, and Spiritual.
enhanced_description: Happidition is a holistic wellness company, launched in 2022, operating in both B2B and B2C sectors. It specializes in helping individuals and organizations achieve happy and healthy well-being through evidence-based approaches. The company focuses on six key wellness dimensions: Emotional, Mental, Occupational, Intellectual, Digital, and Spiritual. Their core methodology is encapsulated by the motto 'Assess | Elevate | Transform,' aiming to foster a deeper self-understanding for sustained health and happiness. Happidition is led by Founder & CEO Ms. Sneha Vashisht, an Internationally Certified Psychotherapist, Behavioral Psychologist, and Corporate Wellness Trainer with extensive experience, having trained over 1.2 lakh people across top corporates, schools, and colleges in India, US, and Europe. She is recognized as a leading expert in holistic wellness, leadership, and training.
key_use_cases: Facilitating holistic employee well-being across Emotional, Mental, Occupational, Intellectual, Digital, and Spiritual dimensions
Supporting personal well-being and self-understanding for individuals
competitive_advantages: Expert-led approach with a founder who is an Internationally Certified Psychotherapist and Behavioral Psychologist
Extensive experience in corporate wellness training, having trained over 1.2 lakh people across multiple geographies
Focus on holistic, evidence-based approaches covering six distinct wellness dimensions
Recognition as a top trainer in holistic wellness and leadership
implementation_scenarios: As a corporate wellness program solution for businesses
As a direct-to-consumer wellness offering for individuals
